subject: Attention Friend
body:
Office of the Director General of the Debt Reconciliation management,
447/448 Constitution Avenue Central Business District, Abuja FCT,

Attention Friend

My Name is Ms Patience Oniha The Director-General of the Debt
Reconciliation management office, I feel quite safe dealing with you in
this mutual beneficial transaction though, this medium (Internet) has been
greatly abused this days, But i want you to know that one does not closes
his or her eyes for the sake of bad people, he or she will not notice when
the good people passersby, I choose to reach you through this medium
(Internet) because it still remains the fastest, surest and most secured
medium of communication, However, this correspondence is purely private,
and it should be treated as such. I also guarantee you that this message is
hitch free from all what you
may think of due to your past experience.

I am contacting you based on Trust and confidentiality that will be
attached to this message for the benefit of you and your entire Family,The
Debt Reconciliation management Office, DMO) in a recent meeting with
President Bola Ahmed Tinubu, The Ecowas Court and the United, recommended
that Buhari's Government failed woefully to Release your Unclaimed funds to
you after his 8years administration, to this effect the United Nation, The
Ecowas Court and the New President of Nigeria , President Bola Ahmed Tinubu
have mandated the Debt Reconciliation Management to Release your unpaid
funds to you valued the sum of $15million dollars and the process will
begin immediately you respond swiftly to this email,
debtmanagementoffice2024@gmail.com, with the information below.

Please All i need from you is the Medium in which you Prefer this payment
to be released to you and by doing so i will advice you to fill the details
below and return Back to me Immediately for the due Process of releasing
this funds to you within 1 week as instructed by the United Nation, The
Ecowas Court of Justice and President Bola Ahmed Tinubu.

Below details are needed from you immediately

Your Full Name
Bank Name
Bank account Number
Bank Address
Bank Routing Or Swift Code Number
Your Direct Address
Your Direct Phone Number
Your Occupation
country/State Of Origin
Identification

Thanks And Remain Blessed

FROM MS. PATIENCE ONIHA
DIRECTOR GENERAL, DEBT RECONCILIATION MANAGEMENT

subject: Re: Attention Friend
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have shared regarding the release of my unclaimed funds. I am interested in learning more about the process.

Could you please provide me with additional details on how the funds will be released? I would like to understand the options available for receiving the payment.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Harry
